QUOTES.TEXT: I have used DSX as my sole crypto exchange for the past 5 years and would highly recommend them to others. For me, their ease of use, expertise and great customer support is what separates them from the competition.
QUOTES.AUTHOR: Peter Wood

QUOTES.TEXT: During our time working with DSX, we’ve come to know not only the reliability of the company, but also the highest standards of professionalism and technical knowledge of its specialists. Their specialists have made huge efforts to make working together very fruitful, and we’re incredibly grateful to work with them.
QUOTES.AUTHOR: Anton Chashchin, CBDO of OKONTO

QUOTES.TEXT: DSX is a very competent and responsive team with great product and business approach.
QUOTES.AUTHOR: Aximetria

ITEMS.QUESTION: Which currencies and coins does the DSX platform support?
ITEMS.ANSWER: We're always on the hunt for new currencies and coins to add to our platform. Currently, we support USD, EUR, GBP, RUB, TRY, BTC, LTC, ETH, BCH, BTG, EURS, USDT, BSV, EOS, XRP.

ITEMS.QUESTION: How do I fund my account?
ITEMS.ANSWER: The simple answer is: however you like! Choose from bank transfers, debit and credit cards or our seamless integration with ePayments wallets.

ITEMS.QUESTION: Is my money safe?
ITEMS.ANSWER: We have two-factor authentication, cold storage, smart backup and manual withdrawals to ensure DSX is the most exciting and safest platform for crypto trading.

ITEMS.QUESTION: How fast are you?
ITEMS.ANSWER: Is instantaneous good enough? All trades are immediate, and we provide you with up to level II market data, to ensure you can react to changes in the market quickly.

about.META_DESCRIPTION: Our mission to get the hell out of the way and let you trade – your way.
about.TITLE: About | DSX
about.DESCRIPTION: Our mission to get the hell out of the way and let you trade – your way.
about.MISSION_ANSWER1: To get the hell out of the way and let you trade – your way.
about.MISSION_ANSWER2: To give you the confidence you’ve never felt with any other crypto platform.
about.STANDOUT_TITLE: A professional exchange platform for cryptocurrency traders.
about.STANDOUT_TEXT:
At DSX we wanted to create an environment that captures the adventure of the crypto universe in a platform that is safe, trusted and beautiful to use. We've built a platform that's the sidekick to those taking their first steps.

We've developed a team that's an ally for traders realising their everyday dreams and the engine for our partners. We make exchanging, trading and using crypto easy so you can focus on where it takes you.
about.SPONTANEOUS_TEXT: The smartest, most inspiring and intuitive crypto technology out there. It’s tech you want to tell your friends about.
about.SERVICES_ITEM_TEXT_1: Looking for an authentic cryptocurrency partner? Let's talk
about.SERVICES_ITEM_TEXT_2: Already a crypto pro? We've got you covered
about.SERVICES_ITEM_TEXT_3: Looking for an authentic cryptocurrency partner? Let's talk
about.TEAM_TEXT_TOP:
Bankers without bowlers.
Techies without tears.
Crypto with credibility.
about.TEAM_TEXT_BOTTOM:
Born out of London, DSX has harnessed the essence of crypto and combined it with the professionalism of the financial world.

It’s the adventure you’ve been looking for, with the perfect partner to get you there.

fees.TITLE: Fees | DSX
fees.INTRO_TEXT: We'll never charge you account opening or maintenance fees, nor will we ever hit you with account termination charges.
fees.COMMISSION_TEXT: In the event of a crosschain or a deposit of an unsupported token, we will attempt to recover the funds and refund your wallet. A 10% commission, in the crypto equivalent, of the total value recovered will be charged (min. €5 max €100).

partners.TITLE: Partners | DSX
partners.HERO_TEXT: Secure and instant exchanges and conversions for your customers. Your business is our business.
partners.STUDIES_TEXT_1: Anyone who uses crypto knows the financial establishment’s limitations can get in the way. Trying to send or receive payments across borders can be a real challenge. Founded in 2011, ePayments is a provider of electronic cash money that is in business to relieve that pain.

DSX lets you focus on your business.

ITEMS.QUESTION: Can I try out the DSX trading platform without spending actual money?
ITEMS.ANSWER: Yes! The easiest way to see what we’re all about is to use our demo platform. It’s free to try after you register. Enter your email address, verify it and set up your password, and you’re on your way to unlimited access to our demo. When you log in to the trading platform, look in the lower left corner for the name of the current account selected. If it is ‘Trading demo’, you’re ready to go. If you see any other name, click to choose the demo account instead. Now dive right in and learn the ropes. Put our demo through the paces until you’re ready for the next step. Every journey starts with a single step and dreams only come true when you open your eyes.

ITEMS.QUESTION: How do I fund my account?
ITEMS.ANSWER: The simple answer is: however you like! Choose from bank transfers, debit and credit cards or our seamless integration with ePayments wallets.
